projects.contribution: I was the sole contributor to this project, developing both the server and client
projects.description: A web application utilizing the Spotify API to track monthly playlists and improve playlist management
features: Users can view their Spotify playlists and songs
Songs can be compared across monthly playlists
Users can play the songs in their monthly playlists through the web app
Playlist manager allowing for easy combining of playlists
projects.name: Trender

projects.contribution: I connected Google's Natural Language Processing API to our application, and interpreted its results to display on the front-end
projects.description: If you apply to many jobs or internships, it can be hard to keep track of the recruitment stages you are in. TMI helps you organize recruiter emails and automatically track all of your recruitment stages
features: Uses the Gmail API to access emails and filters by email domains
Leverages Google's Natural Language Processing library to get the tone and keywords of an email
Allows for user toggling of specific emails and email domains
projects.name: Track My Internships
